error.message:
400 - {"error":"No payment method available for this store
3/1/20 9:29:25 AM: Creation of invoice starting
3/1/20 9:29:25 AM: LTC_USD: The rating rule is (bitstamp(LTC_USD)) * (0.75, 1.25)
3/1/20 9:29:25 AM: LTC_USD: The evaluated rating rule is (ERR_RATE_UNAVAILABLE(bitstamp, LTC_USD)) * (0.75, 1.25)
3/1/20 9:29:25 AM: LTC_USD: Rate rule error (RateUnavailable)
3/1/20 9:29:25 AM: LTC_USD: Exception reaching exchange bitstamp (Unauthorized access to the API, premium plan needed)
3/1/20 9:29:25 AM: BTC_USD: The rating rule is (bitstamp(BTC_USD)) * (0.75, 1.25)
3/1/20 9:29:25 AM: BTC_USD: The evaluated rating rule is (ERR_RATE_UNAVAILABLE(bitstamp, BTC_USD)) * (0.75, 1.25)
3/1/20 9:29:25 AM: BTC_USD: Rate rule error (RateUnavailable)
3/1/20 9:29:25 AM: BTC_USD: Exception reaching exchange bitstamp (Unauthorized access to the API, premium plan needed)
3/1/20 9:29:25 AM: FTC_USD: The rating rule is (bittrex(FTC_BTC) * bitstamp(BTC_USD)) * (0.75, 1.25)
3/1/20 9:29:25 AM: FTC_USD: The evaluated rating rule is ((0.0000009, 0.00000093) * ERR_RATE_UNAVAILABLE(bitstamp, BTC_USD)) * (0.75, 1.25)
3/1/20 9:29:25 AM: FTC_USD: Rate rule error (RateUnavailable)
3/1/20 9:29:25 AM: FTC_USD: Exception reaching exchange bitstamp (Unauthorized access to the API, premium plan needed)
"}
